Title: Relates to liability of the state for damages caused by reported defects and potholes
Summary: Relates to liability of the state for damages caused by reported defects and potholes if the report was made fourteen days or more before the damage occurred; establishes an interactive website for reporting defects and potholes on the state highway system and thruway.
LawCode: Amd ยง58, Hway L; amd ยง14, Transp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to liability of the state for damages caused by reported defects and potholes; and to amend the transportation law, in relation to establishing an interactive website for reporting defects and potholes on the state highway system and thruway
